name: Dottie's Carne Guisada
ingredients: 2 pound chuck roast, trimmed and cubed

instructions.en: In a large Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Brown the beef cubes on all sides.
Add all of the remaining ingredients; bring to a simmer.
Cover and simmer for 2 hours or until the beef is very tender.
Remove the lid and raise the heat. Simmer until the liquid has thickened, about 10 minutes.
Serve in low carb tortillas or over chopped lettuce, if desired. Top with cheese, sour cream, guacamole, etc. as preferred.

notes: This recipe makes 4-6 servings. The dish can be frozen. An alternative method for thickening is provided using xanthan gum. The recipe can accommodate a 3 or 4 pound roast to stretch servings. Nutritional information is provided for both 1/4 and 1/6 of the recipe. The counts do not include optional tortillas, lettuce, or toppings.
